item.description:
The Red Sox Natives have been organizing Patriots and Football Viewing Events at Boston, Wakefield and Woburn venues over the past season with up to 60 people attending. 

We will return to the Greatest Bar on Sunday, January 15 at 1:00 pm to watch either one or both of the Divisional Playoff Games.

Regardless of the results of Saturday night's Patriots game, REAL FANS OF PLAYOFF FOOTBALL will enjoy:

Baltimore vs Houston at 1:00pm

                and

Green Bay vs the New York Giants at 4:30PM

The crowd should be calmer for the first game. However, The Greatest Bar is expecting about 250 people for the later game, many New York Giants fans! Expect mayhem during the second game.

There is no cover.

The first, second and third floors will be open. Early arrivals will get the best seats on the first and second floors and that is where we will be.  

The Greatest Bar is super conveniently located next to the TD Garden and on the Green and Orange Lines and Commuter Rail at North Station. The Red and Blue Lines are within a 10 minute walk and street parking is also available if you arrive early.

Everyone is responsible for their own food/drink. PLEASE MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB OR PAY AS YOU GO AND TIP YOUR SERVER. 

Please RSVP ASAP or by Saturday at 1:00 PM  Indicate your arrival time with your RSVP. Invite other football fans, friends and guests. We will send out an update to all RSVPs on Saturday.  

Other groups may join us within the next few days. So far we have:

Boston Happy Hour (Tonya)

 

We hope to see you there.

The Red Sox Natives Team

 

 

 

 

COME ON NATIVES!! IT'S ON! ;)
item.how_to_find_us: We have the 2nd floor lounge reserved for us and several other groups want to join us.
item.name: Divisional Playoff Football Viewing Party - Watch 2 Games at The Greatest Bar
